mapper.sql: Video_Id, Video_Title, Video_ImageId, Video_CreateTime, Video_ModifyTime, Video_Status, Video_Weight, Video_WeChatID, Video_Praise, Video_Url, Video_VID, Video_AreaId, Video_AreaName, Video_UserId, Video_UserType, Video_VoteCount, Video_VoteId, Video_LikeCount, Video_IsActivity, Video_Hot, Video_CommentCount, Video_Type, Video_FileSize, Video_FileTime, Video_UserName, Video_UserHeadIcon, Belong_type
mapper.select:
select
, ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rb_payrecords WHERE PayRecord_UserID = #{UseID,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND PayRecord_BelongId = Video_Id AND PayRecord_TypeId = 0 AND PayRecord_Deleted = 0 AND PayRecord_Status = 0 ) AS User_Pay, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rb_likestatus WHERE From_UserId = #{UseID,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND Colu_Id = Video_Id AND Like_Type = 0 LIMIT 1) AS User_Like FROM rb_video
1=1
and Video_UserId=#{userId}
and Video_UserId=#{DBID}
and Video_Type=#{Type}
and Video_Type > 0 AND Video_Type < 10
and Video_Type > 10 AND Video_Type < 40
and Video_Type > 0 AND Video_Type < 10
and Video_Type > 9 AND Video_Type < 20
and Video_Type > 19 AND Video_Type < 30
and Video_Type > 29 AND Video_Type < 40
order by Video_CreateTime DESC
limit #{start},#{size}

SELECT Video_UserId, userinfo_signature, User_Name, User_HeadIcon, Video_CreateTime FROM rb_video, rb_userinfo, rb_user
AND userinfo_userid = User_Id AND Video_UserId = User_Id GROUP BY Video_UserId ORDER BY Video_CreateTime DESC

mapper.update:
update rb_video
Video_Title = #{videoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Video_ImageId = #{videoImageid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
Video_CreateTime = #{videoCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Video_ModifyTime = #{videoModifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Video_Status = #{videoStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Video_Weight = #{videoWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Video_WeChatID = #{videoWechatid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
Video_Praise = #{videoPraise,jdbcType=BIGINT},
Video_Url = #{videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Video_VID = #{videoVid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Video_AreaId = #{videoAreaid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
Video_AreaName = #{videoAreaname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Video_UserId = #{videoUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
Video_UserType = #{videoUsertype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Video_VoteCount = #{videoVotecount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
Video_VoteId = #{videoVoteid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
Video_LikeCount = #{videoLikecount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
Video_IsActivity = #{videoIsactivity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Video_Hot = #{videoHot,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Video_CommentCount = #{videoCommentcount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
Video_Type = #{videoType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Video_FileSize = #{videoFilesize,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Video_FileTime = #{videoFiletime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
Video_Content = #{videoContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
Video_ClickCount = #{videoClickcount,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
Video_UseMoney = #{videoUseMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where Video_Id = #{videoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update rb_video set Video_Title = #{videoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Video_ImageId = #{videoImageid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Video_CreateTime = #{videoCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Video_ModifyTime = #{videoModifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Video_Status = #{videoStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Video_Weight = #{videoWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Video_WeChatID = #{videoWechatid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Video_Praise = #{videoPraise,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Video_Url = #{videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Video_VID = #{videoVid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Video_AreaId = #{videoAreaid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Video_AreaName = #{videoAreaname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Video_UserId = #{videoUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Video_UserType = #{videoUsertype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Video_VoteCount = #{videoVotecount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Video_VoteId = #{videoVoteid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Video_LikeCount = #{videoLikecount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Video_IsActivity = #{videoIsactivity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Video_Hot = #{videoHot,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Video_CommentCount = #{videoCommentcount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Video_Type = #{videoType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Video_FileSize = #{videoFilesize,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Video_FileTime = #{videoFiletime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Video_Content = #{videoContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, Video_ClickCount = #{videoClickcount,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, Video_UseMoney = #{videoUseMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where Video_Id = #{videoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update rb_video set Video_Title = #{videoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Video_ImageId = #{videoImageid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Video_CreateTime = #{videoCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Video_ModifyTime = #{videoModifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Video_Status = #{videoStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Video_Weight = #{videoWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Video_WeChatID = #{videoWechatid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Video_Praise = #{videoPraise,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Video_Url = #{videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Video_VID = #{videoVid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Video_AreaId = #{videoAreaid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Video_AreaName = #{videoAreaname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Video_UserId = #{videoUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Video_UserType = #{videoUsertype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Video_VoteCount = #{videoVotecount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Video_VoteId = #{videoVoteid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Video_LikeCount = #{videoLikecount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Video_IsActivity = #{videoIsactivity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Video_Hot = #{videoHot,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Video_CommentCount = #{videoCommentcount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Video_Type = #{videoType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Video_FileSize = #{videoFilesize,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Video_FileTime = #{videoFiletime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Video_UseMoney = #{videoUseMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where Video_Id = #{videoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update rb_video set Video_LikeCount = Video_LikeCount+1 where Video_Id = #{videoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update rb_video set Video_LikeCount = Video_LikeCount-1 where Video_Id = #{videoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update rb_video set Video_ClickNumber=Video_ClickNumber+1 where Video_Id = #{videoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update rb_video set Video_Weight = Video_Weight+1 where Video_Id = #{videoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
